title: The Assassination of Jesse James by the Coward Robert Ford
actors: Brad Pitt, Casey Affleck, Sam Shepard
plot: Robert Ford, who has idolized Jesse James since childhood, tries hard to join the resurgent gang of the Missouri outlaw, but gradually becomes resentful of the bandit leader.
awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. 25 wins & 69 nominations total
